author: Nick Statt
title: Instagram will let you browse posts with friends over video chat to promote social distancing
description: Instagram is ramping up its efforts to combat coronavirus-related misinformation on its platform while also giving people tools to promote healthy behavior during the COVID-19 pandemic. That includes a new feature called Co-Watching that will let you browse p…
content:
In addition to ramping up its fight against coronavirus-related misinformation
